post.summary: Create a change stream.
Login a user with username/email and password.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Related objects to include in the response. See the description of return value for more details.

schema.description:
The response body contains properties of the AccessToken created on login.
Depending on the value of `include` parameter, the body may contain additional properties:

  - `user` - `U+007BUserU+007D` - Data of the currently logged in user. (`include=user`)

post.summary: Logout a user with access token.
Trigger user's identity verification with configured verifyOptions

get.summary: Confirm a user registration with identity verification token.

post.summary: Reset password for a user with email.
Change a user's password.
Reset user's password via a password-reset token.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: hourly, daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, custom
